solution_line_template: He drinks {bottles_per_month} bottles every month and there are {months_per_year} months in 1 year so that's {bottles_per_month}*{months_per_year} = <<{bottles_per_month}*{months_per_year}={total_bottles}>>{total_bottles} bottles
He earns ${refund_per_bottle} on every bottle that he recycles so that's {refund_per_bottle}*{total_bottles} = $<<{refund_per_bottle}*{total_bottles}={total_refund}>>{total_refund}
He has ${total_refund} and each bottle costs ${bottle_cost} so he can buy {total_refund}/{bottle_cost} = <<{total_refund}/{bottle_cost}={bottles_can_buy}>>{bottles_can_buy} bottles
